reviewText: If you're not familiar with the cultural crossroads that lead to this hugely important work of fiction - you have quite a treat in store for you in watching this DVD.  I've watched in a few times over the years - and have given it as gifts (to scientist friends and writers who enjoy the confluence of scientific/medical/cultural/psychological history that led to this book) where it was very well-received.  I can't recommend this higher.  The other review?  Dry?  Just deal-dull wrong.
It has good information, but it is rather dry.
